Admiral.Title: Zek
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable 1 of your Upgrades and 1 Upgrade (your choice) on the target ship. This card may only be purchased for a Ferengi ship.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1. Disable 1 of your Upgrades and 1 Upgrade (your choice) on the target ship. This card may only be purchased for a Ferengi ship.
